movie.title: Investigation 13
movie.description_intro: A group of science students have discovered how to scientifically explain the paranormal. Their goal is to present their findings to their school board and petition to launch the very first parapsychology credited course at their university. Their thirteenth and final investigation lands them at Black Grove Psychiatric Asylum where they look into the urban legend of ,The Mole Man, an ex-patient of the asylum who is thought to live within its walls. This first feature will introduce the killer and we're looking to do a spin-off series where we will then go on to produce Mole Man, Mole Man 2 and Mole Man 3.
movie.description_full: A group of science students have discovered how to scientifically explain the paranormal. Their goal is to present their findings to their school board and petition to launch the very first parapsychology credited course at their university. Their thirteenth and final investigation lands them at Black Grove Psychiatric Asylum where they look into the urban legend of ,The Mole Man, an ex-patient of the asylum who is thought to live within its walls. This first feature will introduce the killer and we're looking to do a spin-off series where we will then go on to produce Mole Man, Mole Man 2 and Mole Man 3.

movies.title: The Sultan and the Saint
movies.summary: Two men of faith, one a traveling Christian preacher, the other the ruler of a Muslim Empire, bucked a century of war, distrust, and insidious propaganda in a search for mutual respect and common ground. It is the story of Francis of Assisi and the Sultan of Egypt, and their meeting on a bloody battlefield during the period of Christian- Muslim conflict known as the Crusades.

movies.title: The Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde Rock 'n Roll Musical
movies.title_english: The Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde Rock 'n Roll Musical
movies.title_long: The Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde Rock 'n Roll Musical (2003)
movies.summary: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.
movies.description_full: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.
movies.synopsis: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

movies.title: Buried Truth of the Maya
movies.summary: Maya legend tells us that there is a hidden underground cave below Chichen Itza, now high tech archaeologists are here to find the buried truth.
movies.description_full: Maya legend tells us that there is a hidden underground cave below Chichen Itza, now high tech archaeologists are here to find the buried truth.
movies.synopsis: Maya legend tells us that there is a hidden underground cave below Chichen Itza, now high tech archaeologists are here to find the buried truth.

movies.title: The Man in the Iron Mask
movies.title_english: The Man in the Iron Mask
movies.title_long: The Man in the Iron Mask (1998)
movies.summary: Paris is starving, but the King of France is more interested in money and bedding women. When a young soldier dies for the sake of a shag, Aramis, Athos and Porthos band together with a plan to replace the king. Unknown to many, there is a 2nd king, a twin, hidden at birth, then imprisoned for 6 years behind an iron mask. All that remains now is D'Artagnan, will he stand against his long time friends, or do what is best for his country?
